docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura project for PHP.
An abstract input class; serves as the base for Fields, Fieldsets, and Collections.
The name for the input.
The prefix for the name, typically composed of the parent input names.
Sets the name for the input.
Sets the name prefix for the input, typically composed of the parent input names.
Returns the full name for this input, incuding the prefix (if any).
Support for this input when addressed via Fieldset::__get().
Returns this input for the presentation layer.
This file is part of the Aura project for PHP.
Defines the interface for anti-CSRF protection logic.
Sets the field value for the anti-CSRF value.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The fieldset on which to set the anti-CSRF value.

docblock.description: Checks the raw user input to see if the incoming anti-CSRF value is valid.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The incoming user data, generally from $_POST.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if the incoming data has the correct anti-CSRF value, false if not.

Represents a collection of fieldsets of a single type.

Fieldsets in the collection.

tag.description: A factory to create the fieldset objects for this collection.

docblock.description: Support for this input when addressed via Fieldset::__set().

tag.name: param
tag.description: The data for each fieldset in the collection.

docblock.description: Applies each fieldset filter.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if all filters passed, false if one or more failed.

docblock.description: Returns the messages for the fieldset filters.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The fieldset key to return messages for; if null, returns messages from all fieldsets.

docblock.description: IteratorAggregate: returns an external iterator for this collection.
Gets all the keys for all Fieldsets in this collection.

tag.description: The key for the new fieldset.

docblock.description: ArrayAccess: returns the fieldset at a particular offset.
ArrayAccess: sets an offset as a Fieldset.
ArrayAccess: is a particular Fieldset key set?

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if the Fielset key is set, false if not.

docblock.description: ArrayAccess: unsets a particular Fieldset key.
Countable: returns the number of Fieldsets in this collection.

Is the current iterator position valid?

tag.description: The fieldsets over which to iterate.

This file is part of the Aura project for PHP.
A single field in a fieldset.
The field type.
HTML attributes for the field as key-value pairs.
docblock.long-description: The key is the attribute name and the value is the attribute value.

docblock.description: Options for the field as key-value pairs (typically for select and radio elements).
docblock.long-description: The key is the option value and the value is the option label. Nested options may be honored as the key being an optgroup label and the array value as the options under that optgroup.

docblock.description: The value for the field.
docblock.long-description: This may or may not be the same as the 'value' attribue.

docblock.description: Constructor.
Fills this field with a value.
Reads the value from this field.
Returns this field as a plain old PHP array for use in a view.
Sets the HTML attributes on this field.

tag.name: param
tag.description: HTML attributes for the field as key-value pairs; the key is the attribute name and the value is the attribute value.

docblock.description: Sets the value options for this field, typically for select and radios.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Options for the field as key-value pairs. The key is the option value and the value is the option label. Nested options may be honored as the key being an optgroup label and the array value as the options under that optgroup.

docblock.description: Sets the value on this field.
This file is part of the Aura project for PHP.
A fieldset of inputs, where the inputs themselves may be values, other fieldsets, or other collections.

tag.description: An object to build input objects.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An arbitrary options object for use when setting up inputs and filters.

tag.description: A Collection of this type of Fieldset; defaults to $name.

tag.description: True if all the filter rules pass, false if not.

docblock.description: Gets the filter messages.

tag.description: The input name to get the filter message for; if empty, gets all messages for all inputs.

tag.description: A closure with two params; the first is the value of the field being tested, and the second is the set of all values (typically the Fieldset object itself).

docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura project for PHP.
A top-level form object to contain fields, fieldsets, collections, and anti-CSRF protection.
The anti-CSRF implementation, if any.
Sets the anti-CSRF implementation; calls the `setField()` method on the implementation to set the anti-CSRF field.
Returns the anti-CSRF implementation, if any.
Fills this form with input values.
docblock.long-description: If an anti-CSRF implementation is set and the incoming data does not have a valid anti-CSRF value, it will throw an exception.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: if an anti-CSRF implementation is set and the incoming data does not have a valid anti-CSRF value.

docblock.description: Returns all the fields collection
